sentences.en: Add pasta to your salads to bump up your fibre intake.
sentences.cn: 在色拉中加入意大利面条，增加你的纤维摄入量。

sentences.en: Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water.
sentences.cn: 在一大锅沸水中煮意大利面.

sentences.en: Cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water.
sentences.cn: 把足够的盐水烧开来煮意大利面食.

sentences.en: Drain the pasta as soon as it is cooked.
sentences.cn: 意大利面煮熟以后立即将水沥干。

sentences.en: Drain the pasta well, arrange on four plates and pour over the sauce.
sentences.cn: 将意大利面中的水分滤干，放在4个盘子里再淋上调味汁。

sentences.en: He used to cook up great cauldrons of pasta.
sentences.cn: 他以前常常煮几大锅的意大利面。

sentences.en: I drain the pasta, then I share it out between two plates.
sentences.cn: 我将意大利面滤干，然后平分到两个盘子里。

sentences.en: I eat a lot of pasta.
I'm not overly fond of pasta.
sentences.cn: 我不怎么太喜爱意大利面食。

sentences.en: Pour the sauce over the pasta.
Rinse the cooked pasta with boiling water.
sentences.cn: 将做熟的面食在开水里过一下。

sentences.en: Roll the pasta out as thinly as possible.
sentences.cn: 把面团擀开，擀得越薄越好。

sentences.en: Serve hot, with pasta or rice and French beans.
sentences.cn: 趁热和意大利面或米饭以及四季豆一起端上桌。

sentences.en: The Chinese also eat a type of pasta as part of their staple diet.
sentences.cn: 中国人也把一种面食作为他们的主食之一。

sentences.en: They helped themselves from a large dish of pasta.
sentences.cn: 他们从一大盘意大利面中取一些吃。

trans.tran_cn: 面团（用以制意大利通心粉，细面条等），意大利面食
trans.tran_en: an Italian food made from flour, eggs, and water and cut into various shapes, usually eaten with a sauce
